org.openimaj.text.nlp.sentiment.type

Class BipolarSentiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.text.nlp.sentiment.type.BipolarSentiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sentiment

    public class BipolarSentiment
extends Object
implements Sentiment
    Encapsulate a simple sentiment that something is positive, negative or neutral.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
